title: Jonathan

properties.name: description
properties.value: Jonathan is a historian specialising in the history of Hosidius, found in a house just south of the bank.

content:
Not to be confused with Johnathon.
Jonathan
Released4 January 2018 (Update)
MembersYes
RaceHuman
LocationHosidius
QuestDragon Slayer II
GenderMale
OptionsTalk-to
ExamineHe's a big fan of history.
Map
Advanced data
NPC ID8181

Jonathan is a historian specialising in the history of Hosidius, found in a house just south of the bank.

During Dragon Slayer II, the player is sent to him by Imerominia in order to inquire about Camorra Shayzien, but he will tell you that a heroine like her wouldn't have associated with Hosidius, as early Hosidius settlers were pacifistic.
